p: Due to the non-availability of new antibiotics into the market and an increase in antibiotic-resistant pathogenic bacteria, alternative strategies are needed to cope up with the rising threat. In this study, the combined effect of CKEO with conventional antibiotics against E. coli was investigated by the checkerboard method, and the FIC and the FICI were calculated to determine the interaction of the CKEO with streptomycin/ciprofloxacin.
